subject: Re: [junit] JUnit 4 - installation test failure
msgSnippet: Thanks for the heads-up.  I think that patch 1435561 fixes that bug, so karma is on our side, somehow.  :-) David Saff
messageBody:
Thanks for the heads-up. I think that patch 1435561 fixes that bug, so
karma is on our side, somehow. :-)

David Saff

Ian Pilcher wrote:
> Kent Beck wrote:
> > To support JUnit 4, you also need to include these criteria:
> > 8. Does the class have a @RunWith annotation?
> > 9. Do any of the methods have a @Test annotation?
>
> Speaking of JUnit 4, the installation tests fail on my system. See bug
> #1433131.
>
> --

> Ian Pilcher i.pilcher@...
